remarks: Part of proof of Lemma G of [Crawley] p. 116, first line of third paragraph on p. 117.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2013.)
statement:
cdlemg42.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg42.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemg42.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg42.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg42.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg42.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg42 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( G ` P ) =/= P /\ ( R ` F ) =/= ( R ` G ) ) ) -> -. ( G ` P ) .<_ ( P .\/ ( F ` P ) ) ) $.
